sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_68
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: GW_Read_Adaption_0x04FB ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1345 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1349 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1400 The Chorus shall allow the user of the tester tool to read the status of DID 0x04FB Konzernrollenmodus aktivieren, by means of the 0x22 ReadDataByIdentifier as defined in GW_Anpassungen:
in case the KRM is not active, value "0" shall be returned (62 04 FB 00), in case the KRM is active, value "1" shall be returned (62 04 FB 01).
Read request: 22 04 FB
Remark: 0x22 is allowed in all sessions
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_68 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_72
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: GW_Write_Adaption_0x04FB ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1215 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1220 Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 197 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 677 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1007 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1221 The Chorus shall store the value of DID 0x04FB in a reset-proof manner in Non-Volatile Memory. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_72 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_128
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1093 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1135 The Chorus shall ensure, that Roller Test Mode can be restored after KL-15 change based on state stored in NVM.
Note: Therefore the KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv shall only set according to 0x04FB when KL15 was switched on after startup of CRoute, refer to KRM_127. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_128 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_120
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 198 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1401 Continental shall ensure, that ICAS1 units which are delivered to Volkswagen have the DID 0x04FB equal to 0x00 [KRM is not active]. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_120 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_127
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: updateKRMSignals ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 607 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Write_KRM_0x060918KonzernRollenModusAktivStatus_s_blRollenmodusAktiv ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 849 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 574 The Chorus shall forward the status of the 0x04FB to DNH (and AB_CAN) by means of the signal KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv.
While KL15 is OFF CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv := 0
While KL15 is ON CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv := according to the state of adaption 0x04FB.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_127 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_90
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: checkConditions ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 921 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_Motor50_u16_Rpms ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 985 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1221 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 735 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 790 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 874 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1222 KRM Activation Request
The Chorus shall allow the user of the tester tool to activate the Roller Test Mode (set the DID 0x04FB - Konzernrollenmodus aktivieren to value '1'), by means of service 0x2E WriteDataByIdentifier, when the following preconditions are satisfied:
KL15 is equal to ON AND KL30 Voltage is in Operating Voltage Range "c" (UBmin = 9.0V and UBmax = 16.0V as defined in ยง4.7 [VW 80000]) AND Signal ESP_v_Signal is equal to 0 AND Signal MO_QBit_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0 (value: [gueltiger_Wert]) AND Signal MO_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0 AND Signal ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren is equal to 0 (value: [keine_Aenderung]) AND NOT in timeout.
Request to write: 2E 04 FB 01
Sessions: Allowed in all session, except Default Session 0x01 and ECU Programming Session 0x02.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_90 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_73
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1222 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1223 If the KRM is not active, when Chorus receives a KRM Activation Request, and preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_90 are fulfilled, the Chorus shall:
- set KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv to "1" (KRM is active), - send a positive response (6E 04 FB) to KRM Activation Request.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_73 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_131
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1223 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1224 If the Chorus receives a KRM Activation Request and the KRM is already active, then the Chorus shall send a positive response (without performing any additional action).
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_131 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_118
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: getRequestType ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 246 Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ProcessRequest ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 701 Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 754 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 340 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 732 If the received KRM Activation Reqest was not valid*, then the Chorus shall respond to KRM Activation Request with NRC 0x22 ConditionsNotCorrect.
Remark: *not valid means, that at least one preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_90 was not fulfilled.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_118 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_91
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: areConditionsValid ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 298 Requirement is satisfied here: checkConditions ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 458 Requirement is satisfied here: checkConditions ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 922 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_Motor50_u16_Rpms ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 984 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1224 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 734 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 789 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 873 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1225 KRM Deactivation Request
The Chorus shall allow the user of the tester tool to deactivate the Roller Test Mode (set the DID 0x04FB - Konzernrollenmodus aktivieren to value '0'), by means of the service 0x2E WriteDataByIdentifier, when the following preconditions are satisfied:
KL15 is equal to ON AND KL30 Voltage is in Operating Voltage Range "c" (UBmin = 9.0V and UBmax = 16.0V as defined in ยง4.7 [VW 80000]) AND Signal ESP_v_Signal is equal to 0 AND Signal MO_QBit_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0 (value: [gueltiger_Wert]) AND Signal MO_Drehzahl_01 is equal to 0.
Request to write: 2E 04 FB 00
Sessions: Allowed in all session, except Default Session 0x01 and ECU Programming Session 0x02.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_91 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_93
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1225 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1226 If the KRM is active, when Chorus receives a KRM Deactivation Request, and preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_90 are fulfilled, the Chorus shall:
- set KRM_Konzernrollenmodus_aktiv to "0" (KRM is not active), - send a positive response (6E 04 FB) to KRM Deactivation Request.
Remark: *valid means all preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_91 were fulfilled.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_93 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_132
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1226 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1227 If the Chorus receives a KRM Deactivation Request and the KRM is already not active, the the Chorus shall send a positive response (without checking preconditions).
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_132 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_92
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 755 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 341 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 733 If the received KRM Deactivation Request was not valid*, then the ICAS1 shall respond to the KRM Deactivation Request with NRC 0x22 ConditionsNotCorrect.
Remark: *not valid means, that at least one preconditions listed in requirement SWR_L1_KRM_91 was not fulfilled. ID: SWR_L1_KRM_92 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_39
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/inc/KRMActivation.h line 95 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_ESC52_s_EspRollenmodusDeaktivieren ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 789 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1094 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1227 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 488 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1134 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1228 The Chorus shall set the DTC 0x060918 Konzernrollenmodus aktiv, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was not active (DID 0x04FB equal to 0) and changed to active (DID 0x04FB equal to 1) (and stays active for the qualification time) AND - ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=0 (AND ESC_52 is not in timeout on F-CAN)
Signal: s_blRollenmodus_aktiv
Event Failed Timeout: 2500 ms
Priority Level: 4
Note: KPM 7921348, JIRA VWMEB-27686 The DTC shall be set to active only when the adaption changes from 0 to 1 and stays 1 for 2.5s. I.e. once set to passive by the deactivation signal this DTC shall be set to active ONLY when the adaption was reset and set again.
Note: Since KL15 is a precondition for setting adaption 0x04FB=1 the DTC can only become active when KL15 is on.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_39 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_137
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1095 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1228 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1136 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1229 Regarding SWR_L1_KRM_39:
As defined in Ereignisspeicher GW_Dia_Err_279 the DTC 0x060918 must be set to confirmed as defined above, but independent from the trip counter! Normally, the trip counter needs to be >=2 in order to set a DTC to confirmed, refer to Q-LAH_80114-3407.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_137 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_123
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: s_ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren_Message_Counter ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/inc/KRMActivation.h line 141 Requirement is satisfied here: proceedKRMActiveState ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 561 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_ESC52_s_EspRollenmodusDeaktivieren ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 788 Requirement is satisfied here: GW_KRM_ActivityMonitor ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1068 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1096 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 487 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1061 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1137 The Chorus shall reset the DTC 0x060918 Konzernrollenmodus aktiv, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was recognized as not active -> DID 0x04FB equal to 0, OR - the signal ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=1 was received 5 times in a row.
Signal: s_blRollenmodus_aktiv
Event Passed Timeout: 1500 ms
Unlearn: Counter / Eraseable
Note: Since KL15 is a precondition for resetting adaption 0x04FB=1 the DTC can only become passive when KL15 is on.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_123 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_121
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Write_KRM_0x060918KonzernRollenModusAktivStatus_s_blRollenmodusAktiv ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 851 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1097 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 576 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1005 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1138 The Chorus shall forward the status of the DTC 0x060918 Konzernrollenmodus aktiv via s_blRollenmodusAktiv to PaCo.
While KL15 is OFF CRoute shall set s_blRollenmodusAktiv := 0
While KL15 is ON CRoute shall set s_blRollenmodusAktiv := according to the state of DTC 0x060918.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_121 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_67
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: writeKRMFailureActiveToNVM ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 506 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Read_KRM_ESC52_s_EspRollenmodusDeaktivieren ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 790 Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1099 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1231 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 489 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 675 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1140 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1232 The Chorus shall set the DTC 0x060911 Fehler im Konzernrollenmodus, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was recognized as active (DID 0x04FB equal to 1) AND - the failure by ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=1 was received (OR ESC_52 is in timeout on F-CAN). AND - KL15 is equal to ON
Remark: For DTC 0x060911 qualification time is 2500 ms, potentially it is possible, that if within this time Chorus will receive KRM Deactivation Request the DTC 0x060911 will not be stored in DEM.
Signal: KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus
Event Failed Timeout: 2500 ms
Priority Level: 6
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_67 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_136
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: KRMInitialDTCCheck ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1100 Requirement is satisfied here: UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1232 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 676 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1141 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1233 Regarding SWR_L1_KRM_67:
As defined in Ereignisspeicher GW_Dia_Err_277 the DTC 0x060911 must be set to confirmed as defined above, but independent from the trip counter! Normally, the trip counter needs to be >=2 in order to set a DTC to confirmed, refer to Q-LAH_80114-3407.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_136 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_129
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: if ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 1023 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 951 The Chorus shall reset the DTC 0x060911 Fehler im Konzernrollenmodus, if:
- the Roller Test Mode was recognized as not active -> DID 0x04FB equal to 0.
Signal: KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus
Event Passed Timeout: 1500 ms
Unlearn: Counter / Eraseable
Note: Receiving ESP_Rollenmodus_Deaktivieren=0 must not set the DTC to passive
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_129 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_L1_KRM_124
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: getDTCEventStatus ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 403 Requirement is satisfied here: Rte_Write_KRM_0x060918KonzernRollenModusAktivStatus_s_blRollenmodusAktiv ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/src/KRMActivation.c line 850 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 575 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/ECU_DIAG_Chorus/KRM/c/test/swut/KRMActivation.c.test line 1006 The Chorus shall forward the status of the DTC 0x060911 Fehler im Konzernrollenmodus:
- to the flasher using Rte Port s_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus, - to AB_CAN in signal KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus signal.
While KL15 is OFF CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus := 0
While KL15 is ON CRoute shall set KonzernrollenModus_01.KRM_Fehler_im_Konzernrollenmodus := according to the state of DTC 0x060911.
ID: SWR_L1_KRM_124 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
